transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir, mai Pranav se baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. Sir aapne kal call kiya tha sir mujhe.
Customer: To mai aapko call receive nahi kar paya sir. Actually kal sir office sir off the sir.
Executive: Bata sakte hai kya? Kya?
Customer: Mai mere chhote bhai ne kara hua call.
Executive: Ji sir?
Customer: Chhote bhai ne kara hoga uska number hai na ek aur 8865.
Executive: Ek minute kaunsa number hai sir 88 last me hai.
Customer: 8865.
Executive: Starting hai na 8865.
Customer: Haan last me sir 966 hai na.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji to sir unko boliye call receive karne mai unko call kar raha hu. Executive sir ticket open ho gaya sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aur sir to aap hi aap on karte hai ki wo on karte hai IndiaMART?
Customer: Wo koi bhi on kar leta hai aisa agar usko koi query hogi to wo batayega na ki kis query ke liye call kar raha hai. Thik hai.
Executive: Achha achha to aap bhi sir IndiaMART ke abhi use karte hai?
Customer: Haan haan mai bhi use karta hu.
Executive: Achha to sir ye bataiye sir aap jo use kar rahe hai to isme sir kuch dino se aap ispe active nahi hai sir.
Customer: Active to isliye nahi hai sir koi relevant jo buyleads hai wo aa hi nahi rahi to kya isme active rahega bataiye aap.
Executive: Achha buylead aapko nahi mil rahi.
Customer: Achha aapko. Isme sir kabhi on karke dekho do char minute dekho to usme buylead aisi hoti nahi jisko uthaya jaye. Consume karo to kya fayda usme. Sir jante hai kya hota hai. matlab waste hi ja rahe hai sare.
Executive: Sir jis tarike se panch jo buylead aati hai thik hai. Wo buylead panch logo ko jati hai thik hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maaniye ki aapke paas buylead aayi aur jo active rehta hai na turant sir wo sold out ho jati hai jo relevant buylead jo relevancy buylead hoti hai sir. Aur jo buylead hum maaniye ki irrelevancy buylead use karte hai na sir usse hamara conversion nahi ban pata hai. Aap ye bataye sir ki aap jo buylead use karte hai wo char ghante ke baad wali buylead hoti hai recent buylead kaunsi buylead use karte hai.
Customer: Recent wali use karte hai jo do minute ek minute 10 minute tak ki jo hoti hai na usko use karte hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Executive: To aapke paas sir direct inquiry wagera aati hai ki nahi?
Customer: Nahi nahi inquiry aa hi nahi rahi na direct calls wagera aa rahe hai na messages aa rahe hai kisi ke.
Executive: Catalog view wagera kya karte hai aap? Catalog view se bhi direct buylead jaise isme catalog. Catalog visit karna catalog visit bhi apna dekhte hai jo catalog view me ja kar to usme bhi itna wo nahi aa raha koi dekh hi nahi raha.
Customer: Abhi hum dekh pa rahe hai sir aapko sir buylead aayi ek ghante pehle architectural bead code number 06 225200 se 275000 ki iski order value hai. Quantity 500 ki hai ji aur size iski 8 mm. Type of requirement monthly ye New Delhi ki buylead hai sir. Usko consume kar lijiye sir achhi buylead hai ye.
Executive: Achha dekh lenge karte hai lekin darasal baat ye hai isme buyleads jo bhi hai na relevant buyleads aati nahi hai to ab isko consume nahi karte na isme. Kyuki agar buyleads nahi aayegi to isme active karenge.
Customer: Dekhiye sir meri baat suniye.
Executive: Lagta hai na buyleads se aayegi to kaam karne me maza aata hai active hona. Ji bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul sir aapki baat ekdam bilkul sahi keh rahe hai. Isliye agar buyleads nahi aati to ye sochte hai bhai jo paise lagaya wo waste ho gaya bas aur kya karenge.
Executive: Dekhiye sir ispe aap call lagate bhi hai to bhai ye kehte hai are aayega aayega pata nahi kab aayega.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dekhiye sir mai jaise aapko guide kar raha hu aap waise hi isko follow kare aapko really sir aapko buylead milegi aur relevant buying milegi sir aapko. Dekhiye daily aap na haan sir meri baat sun pa rahe hai aap?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mai keh raha hu sir ki aap na ispe daily active rahiyega thik hai. Jo aapko relevant buylead nahi lagti hai thik hai usko na not relevant mark kar diya kariye. Jo buylead aapko nahi chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir maaniye aapko galat buylead aa rahi ho jo consume nahi karna usko na not relevant usme aata hai usko usme mark kar diya kariye aapko sahi buylead jo aati hai usko consume. Nahi dekhiye 10 10 5 minutes 20 minutes ki jo aati hai usme kya karenge kya usko relevant kare.
Customer: Nahi nahi usme dekhiye isme lead type diya hua hai filter diya hua hai waha se bulk pe click karenge na waha se to sari bulk wali jitni buylead hogi abhi dekhiye sir 10 22 ghante pehle jo buylead aayi hai transparent glass steel bead.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hmm. Isme abhi mai dekh pa raha hu sir transparent glass steel bead ki sir buylead aayi hui hai. Ye 80000 piece ki quantity hai sir ye 10 se 20 lakh ki sir buylead hai sir ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir aap isko aap isko consume kar lijiye sir iski hai fir isko ye 22 ghanta pehle ki aayi hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Chalo dekhte hai consume karke dekhte hai agar hota hai na.
Executive: Haan dekhiye agar aapko nahi samajh me aa raha thik hai ki humko kaise matlab bulk. Nahi samajh me to sir sab aa raha hai aapko bhi pata hai ki ek saal se jyada ho gaya isko dekhte hue ab to aisa to nahi bilkul nahi aata gao.
Executive: Nahi nahi hum wo nahi keh rahe the jaise maaniye agar aapko nayi buylead me samajh aa rahi kaise humko kaunsi buylead consume karna chahiye usme na filter laga lijiye sir usme location ka category ka and kya naam order value usme diya hua hai above 10000 above 50000 50000.
Customer: Level bhi hai na isliye kat rahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mai ye keh raha hu sir aapko agar badi buylead chahiye aapko agar bulk bidding karna hai bidding deal karte hai aap to usme na ek filter diya hua hai.
Customer: Bulk ka mai sir bulk ka bhi filter lagata hu quantity ka bhi filter lagata hu sara jo bhi hai na mujhe ek saal se jyada ho gaya dedh saal hone wali hai mai na sab kuch karke dekhe sab kuch.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Samajh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan ab aisa to nahi mai is field me bilkul naya utra hu jo aap mujhe sari cheeze guide karegi sir mai dobara wo karunga. Mai sab kuch karke baitha hua hu.
Executive: Haan sir. Sir mai aapko na aap mai aapko link bhejta hu aap join kar lete mai aapko na dikhata ki haan.
Customer: Jis time jis time wo baat hui thi na dobara renew karane ki bol rahe the ki bhai hum log WhatsApp pe bhi aapko bhejenge kuch relevant buyleads. Usme se ek bhi buyleads nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye mai aapko na aapki buylead aapko WhatsApp karta hu thik hai mujhe WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bhej dijiyega mai aapka account manager baat kar raha hu Pranav Chaudhary aur mere paas jo hai case hai thik hai aapko mai daily na daily 10 dino tak aapko buylead bhejta hu dekh. Ye jo hamare jo account manager hai kitne din baad change ho jate hai?
Executive: Sorry sir?
Customer: Kitne din baad change ho jate hai jo account handle karte hai na hamara report wagera.
Executive: Kaam matlab aapki baat nahi samajh pa raha kya keh rahe hai sir. Nahi nahi jaise ki pehle to kafi do teen account manager change ho gaye hamare.
Executive: Actually kya hota hai na dekhiye sir jo account manager hote hai sir kaam karte hai change ho jate hai thik hai lekin jo account manager aate hai wo properly training leke aate hai unse waise hi same aate hai sir. To usme koi issue nahi hai sir aapka jiske paas bhi case rahega thik hai account manager jo bhi rahenge to wo unke paas same knowledge rahega thik hai same training leke aate hai to usse koi issue nahi hoga sir. Ji aaj se sir mai hi aapka sir account manager hu sir mera number aap save kar lijiye koi bhi aapka issue hoti hai koi bhi issue hoti hai one mujhe call kariye message kariye mai aapko sir problem solve karunga sir aapko. Aur sir jaise mai aapko sir na jaise mai aapko guide kar raha hu na sir please aap waise hi follow kariyega aap dekhiyega sir 15 20 din aapko sir result achha milega sir aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji mai aapko sir ek WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bhejiye nahi to kyuki ye number to aapka dikhayega nahi. Are thik hai aapka number show nahi ho raha thik hai aap mujhe mai aapko number bol raha hu. Mai bata raha hu 9927359115. Ek minute ek minute ek minute sir wait wait wait wait.
Executive: Ji sir number bataye sir.
Customer: 9927359115.
Executive: Sir check karke boliye sir 9923 273 273 59115 59115 9927359115.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay mai ispe WhatsApp pe aapko hi likh ke bhejta hu. Ji. Mai sir na aapko ek link bhej raha hu thik hai aap usko sir join kar lijiye. Kuch cheeze aapko update aapko bata de raha hu. Video video me video me ek link hai to sir kaun join karenge desktop se join karenge sir desktop pe. Hmm.
Customer: Mai raat me join karunga sir. Raat me join karenge. Aap kab kab tak available hai aap mujhe bata dijiye apna last time fir mai bata dunga iske suitable rahega. 6 baje sir last time hoti hai sir office me. 6 baje last time hoti hai. Ji.
Customer: Hmm. To agar aap 10 minute time de to mai aapko kuch update aapko dikha du fir buyleads to kuch aapko guide kar du. Nahi darasal mai aapko batau mai thoda bahar aaya hua hu abhi. Achha achha sir thik hai haa isliye mujhe pata laga aapko. Thik hai koi nahi mai aapko WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bhej de raha hu. Thik hai jaise bhi ho aap mujhe bataiye jo dusra jo number hai wo bhi handle karta bhai usse baat kar lo aap wo sari cheeze usko bhi samjha do. Thik hai mai unse ek baar baat kar leta hu thik hai sir baki mai aapko WhatsApp pe abhi hi likh ke bhej de raha hu mera number aap save kar lijiyega thik hai sir. Okay okay. Aur aapne aapko buylead bhej de raha hu bulk wali wo consume kar lijiyega aaj. Okay okay. Okay sir thank you so much sir. Okay thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer is not getting direct inquiries.

- Feels money spent on subscription is wasted.



Resolution:

- Executive provided tips to find relevant buyleads.

- Executive offered to send buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive shared his contact number.

- Executive offered a video call to guide customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Executive will send a link for video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, whatsapp
